stsjorbsmod:ArcaneWeaponPower.NAME: Arcane Weapon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, attack a random enemy for %1$s%2$s damage.

stsjorbsmod:BanishedPower.NAME: Banished
DESCRIPTIONS: Cannot give or receive damage. Cannot give or receive conditions.

stsjorbsmod:BlackTentaclesPower.NAME: Black Tentacles
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, all damage you deal to other enemies is dealt to this enemy instead.

DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b1 random Material Component.

stsjorbsmod:BurningPower.NAME: Burning
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, take #b%1$s damage, then reduce #yBurning by #b%2$s. Reduce healing by %3$s%%.
At the start of its turn, takes #b%1$s damage, then reduce #yBurning by #b%2$s. Reduce healing by %3$s%%.
Reduce healing by %1$s%%.

stsjorbsmod:CharityMemory.NAME: Charity
DESCRIPTIONS: Maintains #b!S! #yStrength. Maintains an additional 1 #yStrength for every additional !G! gold you gain.

stsjorbsmod:ChastityMemory.NAME: Chastity
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, lose !D! #yDexterity and gain !B! #yBlock.

stsjorbsmod:CoilPower.NAME: Coil
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you remember a new memory, deal #b
damage to ALL enemies and lose all Coil.

stsjorbsmod:DiligenceMemory.NAME: Diligence
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, Retain !M!.

stsjorbsmod:DoubleCheckPower.NAME: Double-check
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, if you remember #yDiligence gain #yClarity.

stsjorbsmod:EnergizedCustomPower.NAME: Energized
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b

stsjorbsmod:EnvyMemory.NAME: Envy
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you target an enemy with a card, apply !M! #yVulnerable to that enemy.

stsjorbsmod:FlameWardPower.NAME: Flame Ward
DESCRIPTIONS: When you are next attacked, apply #b%1$s #yBurning to ALL attackers and gain #b%2$s #yBlock.

stsjorbsmod:FocusOnThePainPower.NAME: Focus on the Pain
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP, gain Clarity.

stsjorbsmod:GluttonyMemory.NAME: Gluttony
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, raise your Max HP by !M!. At the start of each turn, discard one card.

stsjorbsmod:GreedMemory.NAME: Greed
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, gain !M! gold.

stsjorbsmod:HumilityMemory.NAME: Humility
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain !M! #yThorns.

stsjorbsmod:KindnessMemory.NAME: Kindness
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce #yStrength of ALL enemies by !M!.

stsjorbsmod:LustMemory.NAME: Lust
DESCRIPTIONS: Your attacks apply !P! #yBurning. Each time remembered, apply !R! #yBurning to ALL enemies. Each time forgotten, gain !F! #yWeak.

stsjorbsmod:MagicMirrorPower.NAME: Magic Mirror
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy applies a debuff to you, apply that debuff to ALL enemies.
Whenever an enemy applies a debuff to you, apply that debuff to ALL enemies #b

stsjorbsmod:MindGlassPower.NAME: Mind Glass
DESCRIPTIONS: When you next gain #yClarity, deal #b%1$s damage to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:NextAttackMissesPower.NAME: Mirror Image
DESCRIPTIONS: The next enemy attack misses.

stsjorbsmod:PatienceMemory.NAME: Patience
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 #yCoil each time you play a card.

stsjorbsmod:PlayNextAttackThisTurnAdditi.NAME: Hastened
DESCRIPTIONS: The next attack you play this turn is played an additional time.
The next attack you play this turn is played an additional #b

stsjorbsmod:PrideMemory.NAME: Pride
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, permanently #yUpgrade a card in your deck. Maintains #b!M! #yDexterity.

stsjorbsmod:RediscoveryPower.NAME: Rediscovery

stsjorbsmod:SlothMemory.NAME: Sloth
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw !M! fewer cards each turn.

stsjorbsmod:SnappedPower.NAME: Snapped
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot remember any memories or clarities.

stsjorbsmod:StrangePendantPower.NAME: Strange Pendant
DESCRIPTIONS: Ignore the first #b%1$s damage taken each turn.

stsjorbsmod:TemperanceMemory.NAME: Temperance
DESCRIPTIONS: Maintains #b!S! #yStrength. Maintains an additional 1 #yStrength for every additional #yClarity you gain. Each time remembered, apply !W! #yWeak to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:WrathMemory.NAME: Wrath
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, permanently increase the damage of the last damage-dealing attack card played this combat (currently, !C!) by !M!.
